official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit certain loans from employee benefit plans to owner-employees and shareholder-employees.

summary.text: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code to permit certain loans from employee benefit plans to owner-employees and shareholder-employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit certain loans from employee benefit plans to owner-employees and shareholder-employees.
